title: My First Blog Post
content: This is the content of my first blog post.

title: Exploring FastAPI for Web Development
content: FastAPI is a modern, fast web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints. It is designed to be easy to use and fast, making it a great choice for web development.

title: Understanding Python Decorators
content: Python decorators are a powerful tool to modify the behavior of functions or methods. They are often used to wrap functionality, such as logging, permission checks, or measuring execution time.
